entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 27 March 2023
